name: LABOLATORY TESTS
about: Laboratory tests check a sample of your blood, urine, or body tissues. A technician or your doctor analyzes the test samples to see if your results fall within the normal range. The tests use a range because what is normal differs from person to person. Many factors affect test results.

name: HEART TEST
about: CD for Xray imaging and ultrasound picture will be provided . Inclusive Meal voucher. Blood Analysis, Resting Ecg, Chest Xray, Blood Pressure Screening, Vision Test, Bmi. Check Offers. Send An Inquiry. Request An Appointment.

name: HEALTH LIFESTYLE
about: A healthy lifestyle simply means doing things that make you happy and feel good. For one person, that may mean walking a mile five times a week, eating fast food once a week, and spending virtual or in-person time with loved ones every other day.
